title: Bravefont by Typeface Pictures.
content:
Have you seen this ? I thought it was pretty funny so I thought I’d share it. Somebody put a lot of work into making it.. Lets just say it’s different.

[http://www.suitcasefusion2.com/preview.html](http://web.archive.org/web/20081211121535/http:/www.suitcasefusion2.com/preview.html "http://www.suitcasefusion2.com/preview.html")

author: Mighty Pete

comments.content: I guess you did then. First time I saw it. Thought it was funny.
